testcase.name: Check Assign Button Exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed And the user sees the Available Orders list.................................passed When the user clicks on one of the orders in the Available Orders list......passed Then the user sees the "Order Details" screen...............................passed And the user sees the "Assign" button.......................................passed

testcase.name: Check Assigned Order By Clicking Assign Button
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed And the user sees the Available Orders list.................................passed When the user clicks on one of the orders in the Available Orders list......passed And the user clicks on the "Assign" button..................................passed Then the user sees the Available Orders list................................passed And the user sees that the assigned order item is not in the Available Orders list.passed
